field.name: summary
field.value: Patch to update Monorail Wizard framework to support routing

field.name: description
field.value: This patch allows the implementer to turn on routing redirects for the Wizard framework. Included in the patch is also an update to the Sample Wizard project.

comment.author: jsimons
roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
